welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chertsey, a charming town known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the local culture for an unforgettable experience. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the original terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Located on the south side of the airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with options for premium high-speed access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the main terminal for international flights, serving over 46 million passengers per year.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles both domestic and international flights, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet operations at London City Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights, providing a more personalized and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
